logistic.R: open scientific commitments (manuscript, campaigns, validations, Metaquest launch)
logistic.Theta: documented readiness checkpoints in seed/ and docs/ plus Metaquest parity brief
logistic.zeta: stabilised by BreakPoint rituals, endorsement cadence, and telemetry reports

meta.resonance:
Illuminates how the scientific project narrative stays coherent while UTAC v1.2 moves
from manuscript finalisation to public activation. Metaquest meaning/shadow beacons
plug into this storyline so outreach, validation, and governance share the same cadence.

notes.logistic_role: Defines Θ checkpoints for publication, endorsement, and outreach.
notes.resonance: Establishes β≈4.8 ramp once preprint, endorsements, and campaign collateral align.

notes.logistic_role: Maps existing vs needed assets across theory, analysis, simulation, sigillin.
notes.resonance: Keeps ζ(R) damped by providing immediate activation map updates.

notes.logistic_role: Records historical inflection points and response rituals.
notes.resonance: Provides poetic + procedural guardrails for campaign pivots.

notes.logistic_role: Summarises outstanding publishing, automation, and outreach levers for campaign lift-off.
notes.resonance: Ensures Metaquest sigils inherit the correct Θ checkpoints and narrative motifs.

notes.logistic_role: Tracks parity brief, storyboard sync, and endorsement freshness for Metaquest launch.
notes.resonance: Links manuscript, simulator demos, and outreach cadence to Metaquest parity rituals.

notes.logistic_role: Summarises mq-parity-001…004 so telemetry, demos, endorsements, and codex lineage stay synchronised.
notes.resonance: Ensures campaign storytelling echoes the same Θ checkpoints as the system membrane.

notes.logistic_role: Überführt reales Hoch-β-Ökofeld in das Kampagnen- und Forschungsnetz.
notes.resonance: Stellt Sentinel-Muster bereit, um Metaquest, Manuskript und Governance mit Feldereignissen zu koppeln.

notes.logistic_role: Verknüpft System- und Kampagnensigille so Paritäts- und Telemetriezeiten gemeinsam geführt werden.
notes.resonance: Hält Manuskript-, Outreach- und Automationspfade in einem gemeinsamen σ(β(R-Θ))-Takt.

actions: Update docs/utac_status_alignment_v1.2.md with new Bedeutungs-/Shadow directories and Metaquest parity status.
Summarise readiness deltas in system & project meaning maps.
Draft outreach timeline referencing BreakPoint rituals.
Wire simulator demo hooks into press materials and Metaquest storyboard.
Publish parity brief linking Bedeutungs-/Shadow sigils into docs + codex.
Confirm simulator + manuscript references cite the updated β regression, safety-delay outputs, and Metaquest storyboard.

null_model_reference.description: Project proceeds without integrating safety-delay, meta-regression, or Metaquest parity insights.
risk: Publication narrative drifts from operational reality (ΔAIC guards missing).
Campaign pacing ignores shadow signals leading to resonance overshoot.

implementation_lattice.primary_hook: BreakPoint ritual infusion for Metaquest narrative
Archive continuity narrative in public release
